Summary: saw something flash past two windows in my living room.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Mayo
There were no other sightings in Mayo on or around December 6th 2009
divs: sighting detailssitting in my easy chair watching tv, i saw a bright white flash go by my two living room windows. not a butterfly, bird, or insect. it was going from west to east. the incident only lasted an instant. i saw the white streak above my glases which are only 1 2\1 inches high. used for reading and driving and sonetimes for watching tv. i noticed the bright white light because it was only an inch or so below the rain drip above the windows. i saw it out of the corner of my eye and followed its cource through the second window. there was no way i could miss it. only a bright white streak. like a falling star but on a horizontal trek, instead of a vertical descent. i was only suprised to see this object during the daylight hours. usually i see things like this in the night time. i lost sight of the object as it continued on past the window behind the wall. i knew there would be no use to go look outside for it because it would be gone.
